DOCNAME: CASE OF BAZ AND OTHERS  v. TURKEY
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE respectively and live in GPE .
CARDINAL . The applicants were active members of ORG in ORG at the time of the events giving rise to the present application .

CARDINAL . In DATE , on various dates , the applicants were arrested and taken into police custody on suspicion of their involvement in the activities of an illegal armed organisation , namely the ORG ( ORG Party ) .
CARDINAL . NORP The periods spent by the applicants in police custody are as follows :

CARDINAL . According to official documents , PERSON and PERSON were arrested for the first time on the basis of statements of Mr GPE , Mr GPE , PERSON PERSON , Mr GPE and Mr GPE , who alleged that the applicants were involved in ORG - related activities . As to the applicants ' arrest in DATE , the case file reveals that the police had been informed that there would be illegal violent acts and demonstrations to celebrate the anniversary of the beginning of the armed struggle of the ORG and that the names of the applicants came up as possible organisers .
CARDINAL . Subsequent to these events , criminal proceedings were instigated against the applicants for membership of the ORG by the public prosecutor at ORG , with the exception of ORG and ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG acquitted PERSON and PERSON of the charges against them . The criminal proceedings against PERSON and PERSON were pending at the time of their application to the ORG .
CARDINAL . A description of the relevant domestic law at the material time can be found in the NORP v. GPE judgment ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
